an3.75:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam anandam bhagava etadavoca:
an3.75:2.1: “Ye, ananda, anukampeyyatha ye ca sotabbam manneyyum mitta va amacca va nati va salohita va te vo, ananda, tisu thanesu samadapetabba nivesetabba patitthapetabba.
an3.75:2.4: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam, buddho bhagava’ti,
an3.75:2.6: ‘svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi’ti,
an3.75:2.8: ‘suppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho ujuppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho nayappatipanno bhagavato savakasangho samicippatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, yadidam cattari purisayugani attha purisapuggala esa bhagavato savakasangho ahuneyyo pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa’ti.
an3.75:3.2: pathavidhatuya apodhatuya tejodhatuya vayodhatuya, na tveva buddhe aveccappasadena samannagatassa ariyasavakassa siya annathattam tatridam annathattam.
an3.75:3.3: So vatananda, buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato ariyasavako nirayam va tiracchanayonim va pettivisayam va upapajjissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an3.75:4.2: pathavidhatuya apodhatuya tejodhatuya vayodhatuya, na tveva dhamme …pe…
an3.75:4.3: na tveva sanghe aveccappasadena samannagatassa ariyasavakassa siya annathattam tatridam annathattam.
an3.75:4.4: So vatananda, sanghe aveccappasadena samannagato ariyasavako nirayam va tiracchanayonim va pettivisayam va upapajjissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an3.75:5.1: Ye, ananda, anukampeyyatha ye ca sotabbam manneyyum mitta va amacca va nati va salohita va te vo, ananda, imesu tisu thanesu samadapetabba nivesetabba patitthapetabba”ti.
